titles.title: Commercial Fishermen Safety Act of 2007
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a business credit against income for the purchase of fishing safety equipment.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2275)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
2/27/2007--Introduced.
Commercial Fishermen Safety Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow commercial fishermen a business tax credit for up to 75 percent of the cost of certain fishing safety equipment. Limits the annual amount of such credit to $1,500.
